snippet.title: Heavy Fire The Chosen Few 3D Gameplay {Nintendo 3DS} {60 FPS} {1080p} Top Screen
snippet.description:
❶ Playlist Nintendo 3DS Gameplay Videos part 1 - https://goo.gl/1WKdZP
❷ Playlist Nintendo 3DS Gameplay Videos part 2 - https://goo.gl/cXQVMs
❸ All Games Playlist http://bit.ly/1viPJSe
 ♥☺♥ Don't forget to subscribe ♥☺♥
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Heavy Fire: Afghanistan is an on-rails arcade shooter developed by Teyon and published by Mastiff. It was released for PlayStation 3, Microsoft Windows, Nintendo 3DS, and Wii in 2011. It will be released on Xbox 360 in the near future. The Nintendo 3DS version was retitled as Heavy Fire: The Chosen Few.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
